sources.name: Stores
sources.script:
source(output(
		Store_Nbr as integer,
		Global_Location_Number as string,
		DUNS as string,
		Store_Name as string,
		Store_Type as string,
		Building_Address as string,
		Building_City as string,
		Building_State_Prov as string,
		Building_Postal_Code as string,
		Small_Package___Mailing_Address as string,
		Mailing_City as string,
		Mailing_State_Prov as string,
		Mailing_Postal_Code as string,
		Phone_Number as string,
		Size__Sq_Ft_ as string,
		Open_Date as string,
		Regional_DC as string,
		Dry_Grocery_DC as string,
		Perishable_DC as string,
		Specialty_DC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> Stores

sinks.name: SaveToBlobAsCSV
sinks.script:
FullStoreAddress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['tstores.csv'],
	truncate:true) ~> SaveToBlobAsCSV

transformations.name: FullStoreAddress
transformations.script: Stores derive(FullStoreAddress = concat(Building_Address, ' ', Building_City, ' ', Building_State_Prov, ' ', Building_Postal_Code)) ~> FullStoreAddress
